name: Apocalypse Night
description: Apocalypse Night is an addictive 2D action platforming survival game in which you scavenge resources, build a base, rescue survivors and defend yourself against hostile humans and hordes of monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: WebGL updated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3/i5/i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: WebGL updated
